data.expected_result: There should be either 1)server pic or 2) profile pic of the user who created the instant invite.
data.short_description: The empty space before "Instant Invite" has server pic/user who created the invite link profile pic missing.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create any link. Go to server settings>invites - Click on the invite to open popup and have a look at the empty space before "Instant Invite" text.
